name: World of Sunset - A Platformer
description:
v1.0.5

==========READ FULL DESCRIPTION============

===Controls===

Ok, controls are a bit confusing:

To swing your sword, you need to have your mouse on the side of the player you want the sword to be swung, then you click or press space.

As a result, you probably want to use WAD, so you can have easier access to the mouse. You can use the arrow keys, but it is very awkward.

Please don't be mean about that. I bet most of you play Minecraft. The controls are -- well hard to master. Yet most people love it. Same thing here on my game.

===Instructions===

If you hit the cacti with your sword, you can get a coin. The coins are used to buy extra hearts in the shop. You start with 5 hearts. You can't get any higher than that. But don't worry! If you try and buy hearts when you are at full, you will not lose coins.

Kill the enemies with your sword.

Try and beat the boss!

Settings lets you change your hand orientation, which will let you swing faster on 1 side!

Stats have all the cloud stats about the game! (Bosses beat, enemies killed, etc.)

Read the signs! They have the storyline! Stand by them to read them!
